attributes.title: why does an orange pig have an app?
attributes.review: i got this app to see if my younger brothers may enjoy it. but i opened it to see a horrifying orange pig. this should not be on the app store because i don’t want people to be as scared as my younger brothers were when they saw the gross monster of the app.
When I opened this app it showed me a picture of a racist, homophobic,xenophobic, pedaphile and it made me extremely uncomfortable
